items.content_html: 🔔 Alerto: A lightweight and customizable JavaScript library for displaying alert notifications on your website. With options for predefined or fully custom styles, Alerto offers seamless integration and flexibility for creating beautiful and responsive alerts. Supports different states, animations, durations, and positions.
